languages.text: Мастеру вокса удается настроить корабельные системы на нестандартную для Империума частоту — и мостик заполняется чистым звоном ксеноских голосов. Протяжные и скорбные, они поют на чуждом языке, но каждый офицер на палубе понимает — это песнь о смерти.

traits.locale_text: Мастер Вокса передает входящий сигнал с корабля эльдаров. Сообщение ксеносов полно ненависити и страха — в случае агрессии со стороны мон-кай они обещают прихватить с собой как можно больше человеческих жизней. Они потому требуют развернуть корабль и разойтись с миром.

languages.text: The Vox Master manages to tune the ship's systems to an unconventional frequency — and the bridge suddenly fills with chime-like xenos voices. Drawn-out and mournful, they sing in an unknown tongue, but every officer on the bridge can sense that this is a dirge.
languages.original_text: Мастеру вокса удается настроить корабельные системы на нестандартную для Империума частоту — и мостик заполняется чистым звоном ксеноских голосов. Протяжные и скорбные, они поют на чуждом языке, но каждый офицер на палубе понимает — это песнь о смерти.

traits.locale_text: The Vox Master relays an incoming signal from the Aeldari voidship. The xenos message is teeming with hatred and fear: they promise to take with them as many human lives as they can if mon-keigh decide to take any aggressive actions. They demand that humans turn their voidship around and leave in peace.

The Vox Master manages to tune the ship's systems to an unconventional frequency — and the bridge suddenly fills with chime-like xenos voices. Drawn-out and mournful, they sing in an unknown tongue, but every officer on the bridge can sense that this is a dirge.

The Vox Master manages to tune the ship's systems to an unconventional frequency — and the bridge suddenly fills with chime-like xenos voices. Drawn-out and mournful, they sing in an unknown tongue, but every officer on the bridge can sense that this is a dirge.

The Vox Master manages to tune the ship's systems to an unconventional frequency — and the bridge suddenly fills with chime-like xenos voices. Drawn-out and mournful, they sing in an unknown tongue, but every officer on the bridge can sense that this is a dirge.

languages.text: La maîtresse-vox parvient à régler les systèmes du vaisseau sur une fréquence non conventionnelle. Sur le pont résonnent soudain de voix xénos ressemblant à des carillons. Longues et plaintives, elles chantent dans une langue inconnue, mais tous les officiers sur le pont sentent qu'il s'agit d'un chant funèbre.
languages.original_text: The Vox Master manages to tune the ship's systems to an unconventional frequency — and the bridge suddenly fills with chime-like xenos voices. Drawn-out and mournful, they sing in an unknown tongue, but every officer on the bridge can sense that this is a dirge.

traits.locale_text: La maîtresse-vox parvient à régler les systèmes du vaisseau sur une fréquence non conventionnelle. Sur le pont résonnent soudain de voix xénos ressemblant à des carillons. Longues et plaintives, elles chantent dans une langue inconnue, mais tous les officiers sur le pont sentent qu'il s'agit d'un chant funèbre.

languages.text: ヴォクス・マスターは、船のシステムを従来とは異なる周波数に合わせることに成功した。すると突然、ブリッジ中に鐘の音ような異種族の声が響いた。引きつり哀愁を帯びた未知の言語の歌だが、ブリッジにいる士官は皆、これが悲歌であることを察知する。
languages.original_text: The Vox Master manages to tune the ship's systems to an unconventional frequency — and the bridge suddenly fills with chime-like xenos voices. Drawn-out and mournful, they sing in an unknown tongue, but every officer on the bridge can sense that this is a dirge.

traits.locale_text: ヴォクス・マスターは、船のシステムを従来とは異なる周波数に合わせることに成功した。すると突然、ブリッジ中に鐘の音ような異種族の声が響いた。引きつり哀愁を帯びた未知の言語の歌だが、ブリッジにいる士官は皆、これが悲歌であることを察知する。

languages.text: 音阵大师将虚空舰的系统挑到了某个非常规的频率上。那一刻，舰桥上突然充满了仿佛编钟一般的异形声音。那些异形正在用某种不知名的语言，唱起了冗长而悲伤的歌谣，但舰桥上的所有军官都听得出来——这是一首挽歌。
languages.original_text: The Vox Master manages to tune the ship's systems to an unconventional frequency — and the bridge suddenly fills with chime-like xenos voices. Drawn-out and mournful, they sing in an unknown tongue, but every officer on the bridge can sense that this is a dirge.

traits.locale_text: 音阵大师将虚空舰的系统挑到了某个非常规的频率上。那一刻，舰桥上突然充满了仿佛编钟一般的异形声音。那些异形正在用某种不知名的语言，唱起了冗长而悲伤的歌谣，但舰桥上的所有军官都听得出来——这是一首挽歌。

languages.text: La maestra de vocos consigue sintonizar los sistemas de la nave en una frecuencia poco convencional y, de repente, el puente se llena de voces xenos. Profusas y lúgubres, cantan en una lengua desconocida, pero todos los oficiales del puente perciben que se trata de un canto fúnebre.
languages.original_text: The Vox Master manages to tune the ship's systems to an unconventional frequency — and the bridge suddenly fills with chime-like xenos voices. Drawn-out and mournful, they sing in an unknown tongue, but every officer on the bridge can sense that this is a dirge.

traits.locale_text: La maestra de vocos consigue sintonizar los sistemas de la nave en una frecuencia poco convencional y, de repente, el puente se llena de voces xenos. Profusas y lúgubres, cantan en una lengua desconocida, pero todos los oficiales del puente perciben que se trata de un canto fúnebre.

languages.text: Der Voxmeisterin gelingt es, die Schiffssysteme auf eine unkonventionelle Frequenz zu kalibrieren — und die Brücke füllt sich plötzlich mit glockenähnlichen Xenos-Stimmen. Langgezogen und traurig singen sie Worte in einer unbekannten Sprache, doch jeder Offizier auf der Brücke kann spüren, dass es sich um ein Klagelied handelt.
languages.original_text: The Vox Master manages to tune the ship's systems to an unconventional frequency — and the bridge suddenly fills with chime-like xenos voices. Drawn-out and mournful, they sing in an unknown tongue, but every officer on the bridge can sense that this is a dirge.

traits.locale_text: Der Voxmeisterin gelingt es, die Schiffssysteme auf eine unkonventionelle Frequenz zu kalibrieren — und die Brücke füllt sich plötzlich mit glockenähnlichen Xenos-Stimmen. Langgezogen und traurig singen sie Worte in einer unbekannten Sprache, doch jeder Offizier auf der Brücke kann spüren, dass es sich um ein Klagelied handelt.

languages.text: Voks Üstadı, geminin sistemlerini alışılmadık bir frekansa ayarlamayı başarıyor... Bir anda köprü, çınlamayı andıran zeno sesleriyle doluyor. Uzata uzata ve hüzünle söyledikleri şarkının dilini bilen yok ama köprüdeki her bir subay, bunun bir ağıt olduğunu hissedebiliyor.
languages.original_text: The Vox Master manages to tune the ship's systems to an unconventional frequency — and the bridge suddenly fills with chime-like xenos voices. Drawn-out and mournful, they sing in an unknown tongue, but every officer on the bridge can sense that this is a dirge.
